Title: Time-Based Information Disclosure Vulnerability
Description: The `PersistedUsernamePasswordProvider` is prone to a information disclosure of account existence based on timing attacks as the hashing of passwords is only done in case an account is found.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.3.16, all versions starting from 3.0.0-alpha before 3.0.10, all versions starting from 3.1.0-alpha before 3.1.7, all versions starting from 3.2.0-alpha before 3.2.7, all versions starting from 3.3.0-alpha before 3.3.5
